page.title: US Stocks Up Slightly After Ford Forecast
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. blue chips edged higher on Friday after Ford Motor Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=F.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">F.N</A> raised its earnings forecasts, but wireless technology provider Qualcomm Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=QCOM.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">QCOM.O</A> held back the Nasdaq after saying an accounting review may reduce pretax income.
